title: Petro Poroshenko - Wikipedia
snippet: In November 2014, he became a People's Deputy of Ukraine with 64.04% of votes in constituency No.12. Poroshenko became a grandfather on the day of his presidential inauguration, 7 June 2014. His wife is actively involved in the activities of the Petro Poroshenko Charity Foundation.

title: Zelenskiy's Predecessor Poroshenko Says He Plans To Run For President
snippet: Ukraine's fifth president, Petro Poroshenko, told Al-Jazeera television on April 2 that he plans to run for president again after Russia's ongoing invasion of his country is over.

title: Petro Poroshenko | Facts & Biography | Britannica
snippet: How did Poroshenko’s time as president affect Ukraine’s relationship with Russia and other countries? ... Petro Poroshenko (born September 26, 1965, Bolhrad, Ukraine, U.S.S.R.

title: What's at stake for Poroshenko, ex-president sanctioned by Zelensky?
snippet: In an unprecedented move, President Volodymyr Zelensky imposed sanctions on his predecessor and key political rival, lawmaker Petro Poroshenko. Poroshenko, who was elected president in 2014, lost his reelection bid in 2019 to Zelensky in a bitter ...

title: Top Trump allies hold secret talks with Zelenskyy’s Ukrainian opponents
snippet: Petro Poroshenko, Volodymyr Zelenskyy’s immediate predecessor as president.
